Articles.Content: So, for my 100th post I want to have a huge selection of amazing crafts, spaceplanes, and anything that you want! I ask just for you to vote on the poll for what you most want! I will focus on the 3 most voted on crafts. Thank you, and I will see you on my 100th post during 1.0!

Congrats on 100 posts! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I think you'd do a good job on interplanetary vessels.

> 
> Congrats on 100 posts! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> I think you'd do a good job on interplanetary vessels.

Thanks! Oh wait... AGH!![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif) The counter is going up! Gotta stop posting before it reaches 100!
that's exactly what I did when I hit 1000.

Congrats on the 100th post!

Currently awaiting my 400th...
People think 100 posts is significant . . . . \*looks left\* Psssshhhh.
I'm currently awaiting my 2201, oh wait! This is it! You should build something you have never built before.
